text: James Howard Dunn (November 2, 1901 â€“ September 1, 1967) was an American actor and comedian. Dunn was born in Manhattan, New York. His movie role was in Bad Girl (1931). He appeared in three Shirley Temple movies. His best known role was as Johnny Nolan in A Tree Grows in Brooklyn (1945). He won an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor for this role. Dunn died on September 1, 1967 in Santa Monica, California of problems caused by stomach surgery, aged 65. ==References== Category:American Academy Award winning actors Category:1901 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American stage actors Category:American silent movie actors Category:Actors from New York City Category:Comedians from New York City
title: James Dunn (actor)
